**We** <FONT COLOR="#FF0000">**Love**</font> <FONT COLOR="#0000FF">**Servers**</font>
**Where Quality Meets Affordability!**
<FONT COLOR="#FF0000">Spring Special!</font>
 
We Love Servers is celebrating Spring with VPS promotions available in our newest and hottest locations! The promotions we offer today are available in all three of our hosting site locations: Los Angeles(CA), Dallas(TX), and Buffalo(NY). We have some hot deals available for LET, but they are only available for a limited time. Order now to avoid disappointment!

---------------------------------------------------------- 

<FONT COLOR="#0000FF">**768MB VPS Special**</font>

30 GB Disk Space Storage
400 GB Bandwidth (100Mbps)
768 MB DDR3 RAM
1 IP Address
SolusVM Access
Full Root Access
Choice of Linux OS's
Instant Setup
Self Managed
 
Price: $2.99/Monthly _<FONT COLOR="#0000FF">(Limited Stock!)</font>_
 
Link: https://core.weloveservers.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=39
_________________________________________________________________

Instant Setup
Self Managed
 
Price: $25/Yearly _<FONT COLOR="#0000FF">($2.08/Monthly!)</font>_

<FONT COLOR="#0000FF">**Rudolph: $15/Quarter 2GB VPS *NEW* (Latest Promotion)**</font>
 
80 GB Disk Space Storage
1500 GB Bandwidth (100Mbps)
2048 MB DDR3 RAM
1 IPv4 Address
SolusVM Access
Full Root Access
Choice of Linux OS's
Instant Setup
Self Managed
 
Price: $15/Quarter _<FONT COLOR="#0000FF">($5/Month!)</font>_
 
Link: https://core.weloveservers.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=32

<FONT COLOR="#FF0000">**BONUS:**</font>
**Order the Rudolph plan** and receive a free upgrade to **1Gbps Port**! To claim the free upgrade please open a support ticket/email support. We aim to have all VPSs network speed upgraded within 24 hours or less.


<FONT COLOR="#0000FF">**Network Information**</font>

We Love Servers offers 3 hosting locations for the above promotions. You may select the location you would like your VPS to be set up in during the ordering process.

Los Angeles, California - Test IP: 192.210.195.2
Dallas, Texas - Test IP: 192.227.137.2
Buffalo, New York (New!) – 192.227.135.130
